election_record.label: New York 1791 Assembly, Ontario County

overview.note: "That the county of Ontario is divided into four districts. . . . That none of the said districts held an election for a member in Assembly, except the district of Erwin. That in the said district of Erwin, forty two votes were taken, for a member to represent the said county, in the Assembly of this State, which votes were all give for Eleazer Lindsley." Journal of the New York Assembly, 1792. 26-27.

election_record.reference: Journal of the New York Assembly, 1792. 26-27.
